    • An individual-based model for assessing far UVC interventions

An individual-based model for assessing far UVC interventions

Source: vignettes/model.Rmd
model.Rmd

This vignette describes the modelling approach used in helios.

Population

The population consists of a certain number of individuals with properties.

Disease states

Compartmental model with susceptible (\(S\)), exposed (\(E\)), infectious (\(I\)), and recovered (\(R\)) disease states. Individuals move from state \(S \to E\) with rate something, from state \(E \to I\) with rate something, and from state \(I \to R\) with rate something.

Age structure

Age categories are children, adults, and the elderly.

Households

Households are comprised of the following individuals.

Workplaces

Workplaces are attended by adults. Workplace sizes are drawn from the following distribution.

Schools

Schools are attended by children. School sizes are drawn from the following distribution.

Leisure

Leisure venues are attended by who. Leisure venue sizes are drawn from the following distribution.

Community mixing

Overall community mixing is implemented via some mechanism.

Interventions

To be described once implemented!

Contents

Developed by Charlie Whittaker, Tom Brewer, Adam Howes.
